name: Employment of the skilled technical workforce in U.S. medium-high R&D intensive industries: 2017
description: Employment of the skilled technical workforce in U.S. medium-high R&D intensive industries: 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_total
variableMeasured.unitText: Thousands of employees and percent share

variableMeasured.name: field_stw
variableMeasured.unitText: Thousands of employees and percent share

variableMeasured.name: field_stw_share_
variableMeasured.unitText: Thousands of employees and percent share

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Skilled technical workers are in occupations that employ significant levels of S&E expertise and technical knowledge and whose educational attainment is less than a bachelor's degree. Employment figures are for those aged 25 and older and do not include those employed in military occupations. Medium-high R&D intensive industries are classified by the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development.
sources: Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) (2018), public use microdata. Science and Engineering Indicators
